about_the_game:
The Disasters

Step into a world teetering on the edge of destruction, where demigods once thrived but have now fallen to chaos. The Disasters offers a thrilling roguelike experience, challenging you to restore balance to a world ruled by corruption and war. With its dynamic combat, deep strategy, and atmospheric storytelling, this game invites you to forge your path as the world's savior.

Story Overview

The once-peaceful realm of the demigods has been shattered. Five demigods maintained harmony under divine order, until the Demigod of Desire rose with ambition, allying with the Demigod of Courage to ignite a devastating war. Betrayals ensued, and the realm descended into darkness as Desire claimed ultimate power. Now, with the remnants of the other demigods' sacrifices, an ancient prophecy has awakened. You are the chosen one destined to rise and reclaim the shattered world from Desire's grasp.

Will you wield the power of the gods and bring salvation to this broken land?

Key Features

  • Epic Chapter-Based Adventure

    • Explore 5 unique chapters, each featuring completely distinct maps, enemies, and items. Every chapter offers a fresh and unpredictable challenge, keeping your experience dynamic and exciting.

  • Engaging Combat and Exploration

    • Fight your way through procedurally generated levels with diverse enemies and deadly bosses. Uncover secrets, gather resources, and adapt your strategy to survive the evolving threats.

  • Dynamic Growth Systems

    • Build your power across runs with permanent upgrades through the Prayers and Codex systems. Customize your abilities to suit your playstyle and overcome even the toughest challenges.

  • Weapon and Armor Synergy

    • Collect and combine a variety of weapons and up to 5 pieces of armor to create powerful builds. Unlock set bonuses that grant not only buffs but also unique auxiliary attacks, transforming your combat strategy.

  • High Replayability

    • No two runs are the same. Procedurally generated levels, unpredictable item drops, and evolving enemy encounters ensure endless replayability for both new and seasoned players.

  • A World of Contrasts

    • Immerse yourself in a world that is both warm and atmospheric, yet cold and heavy with despair. This richly detailed fantasy setting delivers a tone that is serious and evocative, drawing you deep into its lore.

  • Challenging Boss Fights

    • Test your skills against formidable bosses that will push you to your limits. Each encounter is designed to be a true test of strategy and skill.

Take up your weapons, explore the ruins of a shattered world, and uncover the secrets of the demigods in The Disasters. Will you rise to the challenge and reclaim the light? Or will the darkness consume everything?

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains depictions of violence, mild blood, and dark themes.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit Operating System
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4170 or AMD FX-8120
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11 Compatible GeForce GTX 460 1GB or AMD HD 6850 1GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DX11 compatible
  • Additional Notes: With these requirements, it is recommended that the game is played on Low quality settings.

short_description: The Disasters is a roguelike journey through a shattered world ruled by chaos. Explore 5 unique chapters, conquer procedurally generated levels, and face challenging bosses. Customize your playstyle with dynamic growth systems and gear synergies as you fight to restore balance and salvation.
